method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::addSelectOption ($option) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

select

SELECT SELECT
DISTINCT STRAIGHT_JOIN 

$qb->addSelectOption(SelectOption::SQL_CACHE)->column('test');
// SELECT SQL_CACHE test.* FROM test

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::column ($tableDescriptor) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

[table => [col1, col2]] 

$qb->column([
    'table1' => [
        'aliasA'  => 'columnA',
        'aliasB'  => 'columnB',
        '+table2'  => [
            'aliasA' => 'columnA',
            'aliasB' => 'columnB',
        ],
        'table3' => [
            'aliasA' => 'columnA',
            'aliasB' => 'columnB',
        ],
    ],
    'table4' => [
        'aliasA' => 'columnA',
        'aliasB' => 'columnB',
    ],
]);


JOIN JOIN
JOIN FROM

table1, table4 table2 JOINtable3


No

Notype
0['cond1', 'cond2' => 1] JOIN
1"**"
2nullnull
4"!hoge"hoge
5"!"
8"..hoge"subselect
10"+prefix.column_name"JOIN prefix JOIN
11new Expression("NOW()")ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Expression
12"NOW()" () ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Expression
22['alias' => function($row){}]
25['cname' => function($cname){}]
27function(){return function($v){return $v;};}
30Gateway objectGateway ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subselect()
31['+alias' => Gateway object]Gateway JOIN
50'TableDescriptor'
51['+TableDescriptor' => ['*']]JOIN
80SelectOption::DISTINCT()SelectOption addSelectOption
98['' => ['expression']]
99['alias' => 'expression']notableAsColumn 

# No.0  JOIN  where 
$qb->column([
    't_article A.*' => [
        '+t_comment: C.*' => [ //  ON : 
            //  t_article  t_comment 
            ['A.article_id = C.article_id', 'C.delete_flg' => 0],
        ],
    ],
]);

# No.1 t_ancestor  t_parent  t_child *
$qb->column('t_ancestor.***');

# No.2 null t_article 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        '***',
        't_imgblob' => null,
        't_hugelog' => null,
    ],
]);

# No.4 ! 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        '!content', // 
    ],
]);

# No.8 "..hoge"  subselect 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        '*',
        't_comment C' => [
            '..article_title',             // 
            'atitle' => '..article_title', // 
        ],
    ],
]);

# No.10  JOIN
$qb->column([
    't_comment' => [
        //  join . JOIN 
        '+t_article.article_title',
        '+t_article.tags',
        // 2 JOIN 1
    ],
]);

# No.11, 12 Expression
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        'upper_title' => new Expression('UPPER(article_title)'), // 
        'upper_title' => 'UPPER(article_title)',                 //  Expression 
    ],
]);

# No.22 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        // $row 
        'row' => function($row){},
    ],
]);

# No.25 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        // AS 
        'id AS idmul10'      => function($id){return $id * 10;},
        // 
        'id, name AS idname'      => function($id, $name){return "$id: $name";},
    ],
]);

# No.27 
$tuple = $qb->column([
    't_article.*' => [
        //  $this  ArrayAccess  ArrayObject bind 
        'func'   => function(){return function($prefix){return $prefix . $this['name'];};},
        //  bind 
        'static' => function($row){return function($prefix)use($row){return $prefix . $row['name'];};},
    ],
])->tuple();
// 'func'  'static' 
$tuple['func']('prefix-');   // => 'prefix-hogehoge'
$tuple['static']('prefix-'); // => 'prefix-hogehoge'

# No.30, 31 Gateway 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        'comments1'  => $db->t_comment, // t_comment 
        '+comments2' => $db->t_comment, // t_comment  JOIN 
    ],
]);

# No.50, 51
$qb->column('t_article(1)'); //  = 1 
$qb->column([
    // 
    't_article(1) AS A' => [
        // JOIN 
        '+t_comment@scope[state: active] AS C' => ['*'],
    ]
]);
// ID103N
$qb->column([
    't_article[state: active]+id#0-10 AS A.*' => [
        't_comment-create_date#0-3 AS C.*' => []
    ],
]);

# No.80SelectOption 
$qb->column([
    't_article' => [
        SelectOption::DISTINCT(),
        '*',
    ],
]);

# No.98  JOIN  SELECT 
$qb->column([
    't_table' => '*',
    '' => [
        'now' => 'NOW()',
        'ttc' => 't_table.colA',                 // 
        'ope' => ['column_name:LIKE' => 'hoge'], // operator 
    ],
]);

# No.99  now,ttc,ope 
$qb->column([
    't_table' => '*',
    'now' => 'NOW()',
    'ttc' => 't_table.colA',                 // 
    'ope' => ['column_name:LIKE' => 'hoge'], // operator 
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::from ($table, $alias = null, $type = null, $condition = [], $fkeyname = null, $fromAlias = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

FROM JOIN

FROM, JOIN FROM ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::column()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::join ($type, $table, $on, $fkeyname = null, $from = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

JOIN


JOIN ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::column() 

#  ON  JOIN
$qb->from('t_from')->innerJoinOn('t_join', ['hoge = fuga']);
// SELECT  FROM t_from INNER JOIN t_join ON hoge = fuga

#  ON  JOIN
$qb->from('t_from')->innerJoinForeign('t_join', 'ForeignKeyName');
$qb->from('t_from')->innerJoinForeign('t_join'); // 1
// SELECT  FROM t_from INNER JOIN t_join ON t_from.foreign_col = t_join.foreign_col

#  ON  JOIN
$qb->from('t_from')->innerJoinForeignOn('t_join', ['hoge = fuga'], 'ForeignKeyName');
// SELECT  FROM t_from INNER JOIN t_join ON ((t_from.foreign_col = t_join.foreign_col) AND (hoge = fuga))

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::innerJoinOn ($table, $on, $from = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

INNER ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::join()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::leftJoinOn ($table, $on, $from = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

LEFT ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::join()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::rightJoinOn ($table, $on, $from = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

RIGHT ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::join()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::on ($condition) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

JOIN ON 

#  JOIN 
$db->select([
    't_article A' => [
        'article_id',
        '<t.maxid'     => $db->select([
            't_comment' => [
                'article_id',
                'maxid' => 'MAX(comment_id)',
            ],
        ])->groupBy('article_id')->on('t.article_id = A.article_id'),
        '<t_comment C' => [
            '!article_id',
            ['C.comment_id = t.maxid'],
        ],
    ],
]);
// SELECT A.article_id, t.maxid, C.comment_id, C.comment
// FROM t_article A
// LEFT JOIN (
//   SELECT t_comment.article_id, MAX(comment_id) AS maxid
//   FROM t_comment GROUP BY article_id
// ) t ON t.article_id = A.article_id
// LEFT JOIN t_comment C ON (C.article_id = A.article_id) AND (C.comment_id = t.maxid)

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

AND OR where

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::whereInto() where

Nowhere
30['' => 123]
31['C' => 'childwhere'] where
32['C/childwhere'] "/" where
33['*.delete_flg' => 1] *
34['*' => "hoge"]* ryunosuke\dbml\Database::anywhere()
40['table.vcolumn' => "hoge"]
41['table.vcolumn' => [cond]] subselect WHERE EXISTS whereInto SQL 
#  AND OR 
$qb->where(['hoge = 1', 'fuga = ?' => 1], ['piyo' => 1]); // WHERE (hoge = 1 AND fuga = 1) OR (piyo = 1)

# No.30
$qb->column('t_article')->where(['' => 123]);            // WHERE article_id = 123
$qb->column('t_article')->where(['' => [123, 456]]);     // WHERE article_id IN (123, 456)
$qb->column('t_multi')->where(['' => [123, 456]]);       // WHERE id1 = 123 AND id2 = 456
$qb->column('t_multi')->where(['' => [[1, 2], [3, 4]]]); // WHERE (id1 = 1 AND id2 = 2) OR (id1 = 3 AND id2 = 4)

# No.31, 32
$qb->column('t_parent P/t_child C')->where([
    // P() WHERE
    'P.delete_time' => 0,
    //  WHERE 
    'C'             => [
        // C() WHERE
        'C.approval_flg' => 1,
    ],
    // "/" 
    'C/approval_flg' => 1, //  'C/C.approval_flg'
]);

# No.33 delete_flg  delete_flg = 0 
$qb->column('table1 t1, table2 t2, table3 t3')->where(['*.delete_flg' => 0]); // WHERE (t1.delete_flg = 0) AND (t2.delete_flg = 0) AND (t3.delete_flg = 0)

# No.34table1, table2, table3  "hoge" 
$qb->column('table1 t1, table2 t2, table3 t3')->where(['*.*' => 'hoge']); //  LIKE "%hoge%" 
$qb->column('table1 t1, table2 t2, table3 t3')->where(['t2.*' => 'hoge']); // "*.*"  ".*" 

# No.40 COUNT
$qb->column('t_parent')->where(['t_parent.child_count' => 0]); // WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_child WHERE (t_child.parent_id = t_parent.id)) = 0
# No.41 subselect
$qb->column('t_parent')->where(['t_parent.children' => ['delete_flg' => 0]]); // WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM t_child WHERE (t_child.parent_id = t_parent.id AND delete_flg = 0)) = 0

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notWhere (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

NOT AND OR where

NOT ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::andWhere (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::andNotWhere (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

NOT AND OR ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notWhere()

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notWhere()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::groupBy (...$groupBy) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

[table => array(col1, col2)] ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::groupBy()

 # 
$qb->groupBy('id1');          // GROUP BY id1
$qb->groupBy('id1', 'id2');   // GROUP BY id1, id2

# 
$qb->groupBy(['id1', 'id2']);          // GROUP BY id1, id2
$qb->groupBy(['T' => ['id1', 'id2']]); // GROUP BY T.id1, T.id2

# 
$qb->column('t_parent P/t_child C')->groupBy([
    // P() GROUP BY
    'parent_id',
    //  GROUP BY 
    'C'           => [
        // C() GROUP BY
        'child_id',
    ],
     // "/" 
    'C/child_id', //  'C/C.child_id'
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::addGroupBy (...$groupBy) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

[table => [col1, col2]] ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::groupBy()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

AND OR having

WHERE HAVING ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notHaving (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

NOT AND OR having

NOT ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::andHaving (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

AND OR ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having()

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::andNotHaving (...$predicates) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

NOT AND OR ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notHaving()

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::notHaving()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderBy ($sort, $order = null, $nullsOrder = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

[col => ASC] orderBy

ORDER BY
{, }
, 'ASC', true 'DESC', false
3 null 

#  ORD
$qb->orderBy('col');         // ORDER BY col ASC
$qb->orderBy('col', true);   // ORDER BY col ASC
$qb->orderBy('col', 'ASC');  // ORDER BY col ASC
$qb->orderBy('col', false);  // ORDER BY col DESC
$qb->orderBy('col', 'DESC'); // ORDER BY col DESC

# [col => ORD] 
$qb->orderBy(['colA' => 'ASC', 'colB' => false]);  // ORDER BY colA ASC, colB DESC
$qb->orderBy(['colA' => true, 'colB' => 'DESC']);  // ORDER BY colA ASC, colB DESC
$qb->orderBy(['colA', 'colB' => false]);           // ORDER BY colA ASC, colB DESC

# [+col, -col] 
$qb->orderBy('+colA');            // ORDER BY colA ASC
$qb->orderBy(['-colA', '+colB']); // ORDER BY colA DESC, colB ASC

# [col, col, col], ORD 
$qb->orderBy(['colA', 'colB', 'colC'], false);  // ORDER BY colA DESC, colB DESC, colC DESC

# 
$qb->column('t_parent P/t_child C')->orderBy([
    // P() ORDER
    'P.parent_id' => 'ASC',
    //  ORDER BY 
    'C'           => [
        // C() ORDER
        'C.comment_time' => 'DESC',
    ],
     // "/" 
    'C/comment_time' => 'DESC', //  'C/C.comment_time'
]);

SQL 

#  uasort $a, $b 
$qb->orderBy(function ($a, $b) {
     //   id 
     return $a['id'] - $b['id'];
});

#  https://arima-ryunosuke.github.io/php-functions/#ryunosuke\Functions\Package\Arrays::array_order() 
$qb->orderBy([
    '' => [
        'colA' => misc,
        'colB' => misc,
        'colC' => misc,
    ],
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::addOrderBy ($sort, $order = null, $nullsOrder = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

[col => ASC] ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderBy()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderBySecure ($sort, $order = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

orderBy

  • from,join
  • select
  • Expression 


// test  id  order by id 
$db->select('test')->orderBySecure('id');

//  OK
$db->select('test')->orderBySecure('test.id');

// Expression  OK
$db->select('test.id AS hoge')->orderBySecure(new Expression('NOW()'));

// test  hoge  id  OK
$db->select('test.id AS hoge')->orderBySecure('hoge');

// test  fuga 
$db->select('test.id as hoge')->orderBySecure('fuga');

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderByPrimary ($is_asc = true, $append = false) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

orderBy

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::limit ($count, $offset = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

(count, offset) or [offset => length] or [offset, length]

LIMIT OFFSET 

# 
$qb->limit(10);     // LIMIT 10
$qb->limit(10, 20); // LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20

# 
$qb->limit([20, 10]);   // LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20
$qb->limit([20 => 10]); // LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20

# 
$qb->column('t_parent P/t_child C')->limit([
    // P() LIMIT
    [0 => 20],
    //  LIMIT 
    'C' => [
        // C() LIMIT
        [0 => 10],
    ],
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::page ($page, $limit = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

LIMIT OFFSET

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::limit()
limit() LIMIT, OFFSET
LIMIT OFFSET

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Pagination\Paginator 

# 10  5 
$qb->page(5, 10);        // LIMIT 10 OFFSET 50

#  limit 2
$qb->limit(10)->page(5); // LIMIT 10 OFFSET 50

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::comment ($comment) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder


: ? 

# 
echo $qb->column('test')->comment('hoge')->comment('fuga');
// -- hoge
// -- fuga
// SELECT * FROM test

# 
echo $qb->column('test')->comment('foo')->comment(['hoge', 'fuga']);
// -- hoge
// -- fuga
// SELECT * FROM test

# 
echo $qb->column('test')->comment([]);
// SELECT * FROM test

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::union ($query) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

UNION

UNION UNION SELECT
UNION 

$qb = $db->select([
    //  union  column 
    '' => ['title', 'content']
], [
    //  union  where 
    'status' => 'active',
]);
// t_article  t_comment  union 
$qb->union($db->select('t_article'));
$qb->union($db->select('t_comment'));
echo $qb;
// SELECT title, content FROM
// (
//   SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article
//   UNION
//   SELECT t_comment.* FROM t_comment
// ) __dbml_union_table
// WHERE status = 'active'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::countize ($column = "*") : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

COUNT(*) limit COUNT(*) 

# status: 'active'  COUNT(*) 
$qb->column('t_article')->where(['status' => 'active'])->countize();
// SELECT COUNT(*) AS __dbml_auto_cnt FROM t_article WHERE status = 'active'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::chunk ($chunk, $column = null) : \Generator

sequence

150 chunk: 10 15
php db

  • NOT NULL
  • ORDER BY, LIMIT

chunk 

// 100 
foreach ($qb->where(['status' => 'active'])->chunk(100) as $row) {
    // do something
    var_dump($row['id']);
}
// SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE (status = "active") AND (id > 0) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 100
// SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE (status = "active") AND (id > 100) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 100
// SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE (status = "active") AND (id > 200) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 100
// Generator

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::neighbor ($predicates, $limit = 1) : array 

# id:5 1
$qb->neighbor(['id' => 5]);
// results:
[
    -1 => ['id' => 4],
    1  => ['id' => 6],
];

# id:5 2
$qb->neighbor(['id' => 5], 2);
// results:
[
    -2 => ['id' => 3],
    -1 => ['id' => 4],
    1  => ['id' => 6],
    2  => ['id' => 7],
];

# 
$qb->neighbor(['id' => 99999], 2);
// results:
[
    // 99999 
    -2 => ['id' => 99997],
    -1 => ['id' => 99998],
];

fectch

2

  • before: SELECT
  • after: return

$this QueryBuilder bind

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::wrap ($keyword1, $keyword2 = "", $name = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

EXISTS
EXISTS

3$name

$qb->column('t_article')->wrap('A', 'B');
// A (SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article) B

# 
$qb->column('t_article')->wrap('A', 'B')->wrap('C', 'D');
// C (A (SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article) B) D

#  hoge 
$qb->column('t_article')->wrap('A', 'B', 'hoge')->wrap('C', 'D', 'hoge');
// C (SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article) D

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::lockInShare ($lockoption = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

$lockoption SKIP LOCKED
SKIP LOCKED
SqlServer Doctrine 

# mysql
$qb->column('t_article')->lockInShare();
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article LOCK IN SHARE MODE

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::lockForUpdate ($lockoption = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

$lockoption SKIP LOCKED
SKIP LOCKED
SqlServer Doctrine 

# mysql
$qb->column('t_article')->lockForUpdate();
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article FOR UPDATE

# postgres  mysql 8.0
$qb->column('t_article')->lockForUpdate('SKIP LOCKED');
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::unlock () : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::lockInShare() ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::lockForUpdate() 

$qb->column('t_article');

# 
$qb->lockForUpdate();
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article FOR UPDATE

# 
$qb->unlock();
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::detectAutoOrder ($use) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::getSubbuilder ($name = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilderryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder[] 

$select = $db->select('t_parent/t_child');
# t_child 
$select->getSubbuilder('t_child');
# 
$select->getSubbuilder();


$qb->column([
    't_table' => [
        't_child AS children' => [],
    ],
]);
$qb->getSubbuilder('children')->where(['delete_time' => 0])->orderBy(['update_time' => 'DESC'])->limit(5);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::getFromPart () : array

FROM (from,join)

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::getQueryPart() FROM JOIN 

$qb->column('t_article A + t_comment C');
$qb->getFromPart();
// result:
[
    'A' => [
        'from'      => null,
        'table'     => 't_article',
        'alias'     => 'A',
        'fkeyname'  => null,
        'condition' => [],
    ],
    'C' => [
        'from'      => 'A',
        'table'     => 't_comment',
        'alias'     => 'C',
        'fkeyname'  => null,
        'condition' => null,
        'type'      => 'INNER',
    ],
];

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::getQueryPart ($queryPartName) : mixed

SQL

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::resetQueryPart ($queryPartName = null) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

SQL



null 

$qb = $db->select('t_article', ['article_id' => 1], ['article_id' => 'DESC'], 5);

# where 
$qb->resetQueryPart('where');
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article ORDER BY article_id DESC LIMIT 5

# limit 
$qb->resetQueryPart('limit');
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article ORDER BY article_id DESC

# orderBy 
$qb->resetQueryPart('orderBy');
// SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::reset () : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::prepare () : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

prepare

preparedStatement prepare
preparedStatement ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::getPreparedStatement() 

$qb->column('t_article', ['state' => 'active', 'id = :id']);
#  prepare 
$qb->prepare();
//  state: active :id 
$stmt = $qb->getPreparedStatement();
//  id: 1 
$stmt->executeSelect(['id' => 1]); // SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article WHERE (id = 1) AND (state = "active")
//  id: 2 
$stmt->executeSelect(['id' => 2]); // SELECT t_article.* FROM t_article WHERE (id = 2) AND (state = "active")

min, max 

# 
$db->min('table');
// results: 1

#  aggregate 
$db->aggregate(['min', 'max'], 'table.id', [], 'table.group_id');
// results:
[
    1 => [
        'table.id@min' => 1,
        'table.id@max' => 2,
    ],

# 
$db->selectArray([
    't_article' => [
        't_comment' => ['*'],
    ],
]);

# DATABASE::METHOD_ARRAY 
[
    // 0
    't_comment' => [
        [],
        [],
        [],
    ],
]

# DATABASE::METHOD_ASSOC 
[
    // 
    't_comment' => [
        '1' => [],
        '2' => [],
        '3' => [],
    ],
]

class ryunosuke\dbml\Query::Statement

Statement


ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert() ryunosuke\dbml\Database::update()


prepare 

$qb = $db->select('t_table.*', [':id', 'opt1' => 1, 'opt2' => 2])->prepare();
// :id 
$qb->array(['id' => 100]); // SELECT t_table.* FROM t_table WHERE id = 100 AND opt1 = 1 AND opt2 = 2
$qb->array(['id' => 101]); // SELECT t_table.* FROM t_table WHERE id = 101 AND opt1 = 1 AND opt2 = 2
$qb->array(['id' => 102]); // SELECT t_table.* FROM t_table WHERE id = 102 AND opt1 = 1 AND opt2 = 2

":id" : ['id = :id']
['id > ?' => ':id'] WHERE id > ? = ":id" WHERE

method ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement::__construct ($query, $params, $database) : void

namespace ryunosuke\dbml\Transaction

class ryunosuke\dbml\Transaction::Transaction

  • begin, commit

$retries
retries([5000, 10000]) 1521015
Generator

$retryable
true


main(function(){})
main([function(){}])

/
main 2 func_num_args 

$tx = new Transaction($db);
$tx->main(function($db, $prev) {return $prev + 1;}, 2);     // A
$tx->main(function($db, $prev = 0) {return $prev + 1;}, 1); // B
$tx->main(function($db, $prev) {return $prev + 1;}, 3);     // C
$tx->perform(); // =3

B -> A -> C
A , C 2
SORT_REGULAR

    • begin(\Closure(Connection $c))
    • commit(\Closure(Connection $c))
    • rollback(\Closure(Connection $c))
    • main(\Closure(Database $db, $prev_return))
    • fail(\Closure(Expcetion $exception))
    • done(\Closure(mixed $return))
    • retry(\Closure(int $retryCount))
  • (1)
    • catch(Expcetion $exception)
  • (1)
    • finish()

  • main

    • begin
      • main
    • commit
    • done
    • finish

  • main

    • begin
      • main(throw)
    • rollback
    • fail
    • catch
    • finish

  • main

    • begin
      • main(throw)
    • rollback
    • fail
    • retry
    • begin
      • main
    • commit
    • done
    • finish

  • main

    • begin
      • main(throw)
    • rollback
    • fail
    • retry
    • begin
      • main(throw)
    • rollback
    • fail
    • catch

class ryunosuke\dbml::Database 

# 
$dbconfig = [
    'driver'   => 'pdo_mysql',
    'host'     => '127.0.0.1',
    'port'     => '3306',
    'dbname'   => 'dbname',
    'user'     => 'user',
    'password' => 'password',
    'charset'  => 'utf8',
];
$db = new \ryunosuke\dbml\Database($dbconfig, []);

# 
$dbconfig = [
    'driver'   => 'pdo_mysql',
    'host'     => ['master_host', 'slave_host'],
    'port'     => '3306',
    'dbname'   => 'dbname',
    'user'     => 'user',
    'password' => ['master_password', 'slave_password'],
    'charset'  => 'utf8',
];
$db = new \ryunosuke\dbml\Database($dbconfig, []);

\Doctrine\DBAL\DriverManager::getConnection

/

begin, commit, rollback

describe

RDBMS


InShare/ForUpdate


InShare SELECT mysql LOCK IN SHARE MODE
ForUpdate SELECT mysql FOR UPDATE

OrThrow

/

orThrow insert

insert affected row 0
update, delete affected row 0
upsert affected row 0 /ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsert()
fetchArray, fetchLists 0
fetchTuple
fetchValue PostgreSQL

mysql UPDATE affected rows 0 OrThrow
PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_FOUND_ROWS = true

[update/delete]OrThrow ['id' => 3] update/delete 3 ['create_at < ?' => '2011-12-34']
/

Ignore

[insert, updert, modify, delete, remove, destroy]
RDBMS INSERT IGNORE

Conditionally

[insert, upsert, modify]
insert insert

\Doctrine\DBAL\DriverManager::getConnection 0 1
0 1

\Doctrine\DBAL\Connection

mysql 

# mysql 
$db = new Database([
    'driver'        => 'pdo_mysql',
    'host'          => '127.0.0.1',
    'port'          => 3306,
    'user'          => 'username',
    'password'      => 'password',
    'dbname'        => 'test_dbml',
    'charset'       => 'utf8',
    'driverOptions' => [
        \PDO::ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES  => false,
        \PDO::ATTR_STRINGIFY_FETCHES => false,
    ],
]);


# 
$db = new Database([
    'driver' => 'pdo_mysql',
    'host'   => '127.0.0.1',
    'port'   => 3306,
    'dbname' => 'example',
]);
// mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/example 

# /
$db = new Database([
    'driver' => 'pdo_mysql',
    'host'   => ['127.0.0.1', '127.0.0.2'],
    'port'   => [3306, 3307],
    'dbname' => 'example',
]);
// 2
// - master: mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/example
// - slave:  mysql://127.0.0.2:3307/example

# 
$db = new Database($connection);
// 

$db = new Database([$connection1, $connection2]);
// $connection1 $connection2

2 getDefaultOptions
cacheProvider

    'autoOrder' => false,
]);
$db->selectArray('tablename'); //  false  `ORDER BY `

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::setAutoCastType ($array) : ryunosuke\dbml\Database

dbml 

$db->setAutoCastType([
    // DATETIME 
    Type::DATETIME => [
        'select' => true,
        'affect' => false,
    ],
    // SARRAY  bool  select,affect 
    Type::SIMPLE_ARRAY => true,
    // STRING 
    Type::String => [
        'select' => function ($colval) {
            // $colval  SELECT 
        },
        'affect' => function ($colval) {
            // $colval  AFFECT 
        },
    ],
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::declareCommonTable ($expressions) : ryunosuke\dbml\Database

CTE

CTE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::select() WITH
VIEW 

$db->declareCommonTable([
    'c_table1'    => 'SELECT 1, 2',
    'c_table2(n)' => 'SELECT 1 UNION SELECT n + 1 FROM c_table2 WHERE n < 5',
]);

#  CTE  WITH 
$db->selectArray('c_table2');
// WITH RECURSIVE c_table2(n) AS(SELECT 1 UNION SELECT n + 1 FROM c_table2 WHERE n < 5)SELECT c_table2.* FROM c_table2

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::overrideColumns ($definition) : ryunosuke\dbml\Database

select, where
TableDescripter 

# 
$db->overrideColumns([
    'table_name' => [
        // 
        'hoge'      => 'fuga',
        // php 
        'fullname1' => function($row) { return $v['sei'] . $v['mei']; },
        //  SQL 
        'fullname2' => 'CONCAT(sei, mei)',
        //  SQL 
        'fullname3' => 'CONCAT(%1$s.sei, %1$s.mei)',
        //  select 
        'misc'      => [
            'select'   => null,  // select  Expression 
            'affect'   => null,  // affect 
            'type'     => null,  // 
            'lazy'     => false, // 
            'implicit' => false, // !column 
        ],
        // null 
        'deletedVcolumn' => null,
    ],
]);

# 
$db->selectArray('table_name' => [
    'hoge',
    'fullname1', // php $v['sei'] . $v['mei']
    'fullname2', // SQL CONCAT(sei, mei)
    'fullname3', //  SQL CONCAT(AAA.sei, AAA.mei)
    // 
    'fullalias' => 'fullname1',
]);

'fullname3' select sprintf($select, )


%1$s sprintf
% %%

lazy TableA TableB TableB TableA or
lazy: true
Database select lazy: true 

# 
$db->overrideColumns([
    'tableA' => [
        //  $db->subselectArray('tableB')  tableB  tableB  parent 
        //  children  parent 
        'children' => [
            'lazy'   => true,
            'select' => function () use ($db) {
                return $db->subselectArray('tableB');
            },
        ],
    ],
    'tableB' => [
        // lazy  Database 
        'parent' => function (Database $db) {
            return $db->subselectTuple('tableA');
        },
    ],
]);

affect insert/update 

# 
$db->overrideColumns([
    'table_name' => [
        'fullname' => [
            // $value , $row 
            'affect' => function ($value, $row) {
                // fullname 
                $parts = explode(' ', $value, 2);
                return [
                    'sei' => $parts[0],
                    'mei' => $parts[1],
                ];
            },
        ],
    ],
]);



# 
$db->overrideColumns([
    'table_name' => [
        'checkd_option'      => [
            // checkd_option  simple_array 
            'type'     => Type::getType('simple_array'),
            // 
            'anywhere' => [],
        ],
    ],
]);

php
php

  • ryunosuke\dbml\Database::setAutoCastType()
  • ryunosuke\dbml\Database::anywhere()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::preview ($main, $options = null) : array

$options ryunosuke\dbml\Transaction\Transaction


RDBMS RDBMS
RDBMS

/

// $logs 
$logs = $db->preview(function ($db) {
    $pk = $db->insertOrThrow('t_table', ['data array']);
    $db->update('t_table', ['data array'], $pk);
});

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::raw ($expr, $params = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Expression

new ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Expression

new Expression MUST

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::operator ($cond, $params = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Expression

AND OR Expression

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()
WHERE Expression SELECT 

$db->select([
    't_article' => [
        'contain_hoge' => $db->operator('article_title:%LIKE%', 'hoge'),
    ],
]);
// SELECT (article_title LIKE ?) AS contain_hoge FROM t_article: ['%hoge%']

$db->select([
    't_article' => [
        'contain_misc' => $db->operator([
            'colA' => 1,
            'colB' => 2,
        ], [
            'colC' => 3,
            'colD' => 4,
            [
                'colE1' => 5,
                'colE2' => 6,
            ]
        ]),
    ],
]);
// SELECT (((colA = ?) AND (colB = ?)) OR ((colC = ?) AND (colD = ?) AND ((colE1 = ?) OR (colE2 = ?)))) AS contain_misc FROM t_article: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::binder () : callable\ArrayObject 

$binder = $db->binder();
// 
$sql = "SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id IN ({$binder([1, 2, 3])}) AND status = {$binder(1)}";
// $binder 
$db->fetchAll($sql, $binder);
// prepare: SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id IN (?, ?, ?) AND status = ?
// execute: SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND status = 1

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::quote ($value, $type = null) : stringnull

null quote '' NULL
bool quote int

Doctrine\DBAL\Connection::quote()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::quoteIdentifier ($identifier) : string

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::queryInto ($sql, $params = []) : string

SQL 

# 
$db->queryInto('SELECT ?', ['xxx']);
// SELECT 'xxx'

# Expression 
$db->queryInto(new Expression('UPPER(?)', ['yyy']));
// UPPER('yyy')

# Expression  Queryable 
$db->queryInto($db->select('tablename', ['id' => 1]));
// (SELECT tablename.* FROM tablename WHERE id = '1')

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::bindInto ($data, &$params) : mixed

?

$params bind ? 

# 
$db->bindInto('col', $params);
// results: "?", $params: ['col']

# Queryable 
$db->bindInto(new Expression('col', [1]), $params);
// results: ['col1'], $params: [1]

# 
$db->bindInto(['col1' => new Expression('UPPER(?)', [1]), 'col2' => 2], $params);
// results: ['col1' => 'UPPER(?)', 'col2' => '?'], $params: [1, 2]

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::whereInto ($identifier, &$params, $andor = "OR", &$filterd = null) : array

where


or 

# bad
$db->whereInto($_GET);

# better
$db->whereInto([
    'colA' => $_GET['colA'],
    'colB' => $_GET['colB'],
]);
Nowhereresult
0''-(php) null || '' || [] || ! QueryBuilder
1'hoge = 1'hoge = 1['hoge = 1']
2['hoge = 1']hoge = 1
3['hoge = ?' => 1]hoge = 1 ?
4['hoge = ? OR fuga = ?' => [1, 2]]hoge = 1 OR fuga = 2 ?
5['hoge' => 1]hoge = 1 ? [ => ] bind =
6['hoge' => null]hoge IS NULL null IS NULL
7['hoge' => [1, 2, 3]]hoge IN (1, 2, 3) IN
8['hoge' => []]hoge IN (NULL) IN(NULL) DBMS FALSE
9['hoge:LIKE' => 'xxx']hoge LIKE ('xxx'):
10['hoge:!LIKE' => 'xxx']NOT (hoge LIKE ('xxx')): ! NOT
11['hoge:!' => 'xxx']NOT (hoge = 'xxx'): No.58 NOT =
15[':hoge']hoge = :hoge:hoge 'hoge = :hoge' prepare
21['(hoge, fuga)'] => [[1, 2], [3, 4]](hoge, fuga) IN ((1, 2), (3, 4)) IN
22['!hoge' => '']- "!" bind (php) :!
23['AND/OR' => ['hoge' => 1, 'fuga' => 2]]hoge = 1 OR fuga = 2 "AND/OR" AND/OR
24['NOT' => ['hoge' => 1, 'fuga' => 2]]NOT(hoge = 1 AND fuga = 2) "NOT" NOT
25[QueryBuilder]QueryBuilder EXISTS Operand should contain 1 column(s)Subquery returns more than 1 row
26['hoge' => QueryBuilder] QueryBuilder hoge IN (QueryBuilder)
27[Operator] Operator
28['hoge' => Operator::equal(1)]No.5 equal key => value
31['hoge' => function () {}]

No.9,10 LIKE BETWEEN IS NULL [~]
ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Expression\Operator


QueryBuilder::select 2 JOIN ON update/delete WHERE 

# No.22 http ()
if ($id) {
    $wheres['id'] = $id;
}
$wheres['!id'] = $id; // 
// !QueryBuilder WHERE 
$wheres['!subid IN(?)'] = $db->select('subtable.id', ['!name' => ''])->exists();

# No.9,10
$wheres['name:%LIKE%'] = 'hoge';  // WHERE name LIKE "%hoge%"
$wheres['period:(~]'] = [0, 100]; // WHERE period > 0 AND period <= 100

# No.11: No.58 
$wheres['id'] = 1;        // WHERE id = 1
$wheres['id:'] = 1;       // 
$wheres['id:!'] = 1;      // :! WHERE NOT (id = 1) 
$wheres['id:!'] = [1, 2]; // No.58  WHERE NOT (id IN (1, 2)) IN 

# No.15:hoge  hoge = :hoge  prepare 
$stmt = $db->prepareDelete('table_name', ['id = :id']);    // prepare 
$stmt = $db->prepareDelete('table_name', ['id' => ':id']); //  id = ":id" 
$stmt = $db->prepareDelete('table_name', ':id');           //  id = :id 
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 1]);                         // WHERE id = 1 
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 2]);                         // WHERE id = 2 

# No.23OR 
#  AND AND  OROR  AND
$wheres = [
    'delete_flg' => 0,
    [
        'create_date < ?' => '2016-01-01',
        'update_date < ?' => '2016-01-01',
        ['condA', 'condB']
    ]
];
// WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND ((create_time < '2016-01-01') OR (update_date < '2016-01-01') OR (condA AND condB))

// AND  (create_date, update_date)  AND 
$wheres = [
    'delete_flg' => 0,
    'AND' => [
        'create_date < ?' => '2016-01-01',
        'update_date < ?' => '2016-01-01',
        ['condA', 'condB']
    ]
]);
// WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND ((create_time < '2016-01-01') AND (update_date < '2016-01-01') AND (condA OR condB))

//  LIKE  AND  OR 1
$wheres = [
    'delete_flg' => 0,
    //  OR 
    [
        'sei:%LIKE%' => 'hoge',
        'mei:%LIKE%' => 'hoge',
    ]
]);
// WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND ((sei LIKE "%hoge%") OR (mei LIKE "%hoge%"))

# No.24NOT  NOT 
$wheres = [
    'delete_flg' => 0,
    'NOT' => [
        'sei:%LIKE%' => 'hoge',
        'mei:%LIKE%' => 'hoge',
    ],
];
// WHERE (delete_flg = '0') AND (NOT ((sei LIKE '%hoge%') AND (mei LIKE '%hoge%')))

# No.25,26
$wheres = [
    //  EXSISTS 
    $db->select('subtable')->exists(),
    // ?  IN 
    'subid1' => $db->select('subtable.subid'),
    // ?  =  <>  BETWEEN 
    'subid2 = ?' => $db->select('subtable.subid')->limit(1),
];
// WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM subtable) AND (subid1 IN (SELECT subid FROM subtable)) AND (subid2 = (SELECT subid FROM subtable))

# No.28Operator::method 
$wheres = [
    // like  LIKE 
    'name' => Operator::like('hoge'),
    // not 
    'text' => Operator::like('hoge')->not(),
];
// WHERE name LIKE '%hoge%' AND NOT(text LIKE '%hoge%')

# No.31
$wheres = [
    // $condition  EXISTS 
    function ($db) use ($condition) {
        if (!$condition) {
            return [];
        }
        return $db->select('t_example', $condition)->exists();
    },
];

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::anywhere ($table, $word) : array

where

  • =
  • BETWEEN
  • LIKE
    • % LIKE

  • hoge:
    • e.g. collate LIKE
  • tablename.columnname:
    • ['enable' => false]:
    • ['type' => 'datetime']:
    • ['collate' => 'hoge']:

  • Database anywhereOption 
# 
# - tablename
#   - id: int
#   - parent_id: int()
#   - title: string
#   - content: text
#   - create_date: datetime

# 
$db->whereInto($db->anywhere('tablename', 123), $params);
// WHERE (id = '123') OR (parent_id = '123')

# %
$db->whereInto($db->anywhere('tablename', 'ho ge'), $params);
// WHERE (title LIKE '%ho%ge%') OR (content LIKE '%ho%ge%')

# 
$db->whereInto($db->anywhere('tablename', '2000/12/04'), $params);
// WHERE (create_date BETWEEN '2000-12-04 00:00:00' AND '2000-12-04 23:59:59')

#  00:00:00  2000/12 
$db->whereInto($db->anywhere('tablename', '2000/12'), $params);
// WHERE (create_date BETWEEN '2000-12-01 00:00:00' AND '2000-12-31 23:59:59')

1

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::createQueryBuilder () : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

new QueryBuilder

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::warmup ($table_names = []) : array

COUNT
RDBMS

mysql (InnoDB) RDBMS

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchOrThrow ($method, $arguments) : void

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchArray ($sql, $params = []) : arrayryunosuke\dbml\Entity\Entityable[] 

$db->fetchArray('SELECT id, name FROM tablename');
// results:
[
    [
        'id'   => 1,
        'name' => 'name1',
    ],
    [
        'id'   => 2,
        'name' => 'name2',
    ],
];

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchArrayOrThrow (...$args) : arrayryunosuke\dbml\Entity\Entityable[]

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchAssoc ($sql, $params = []) : arrayryunosuke\dbml\Entity\Entityable[] 

$db->fetchAssoc('SELECT id, name FROM tablename');
// results:
[
    1 => [
        'id'   => 1,
        'name' => 'name1',
    ],
    2 => [
        'id'   => 2,
        'name' => 'name2',
    ],
];

$db->fetchLists('SELECT name FROM tablename');
// results:
[
    'name1',
    'name2',
];

[1=>2]

$db->fetchPairs('SELECT id, name FROM tablename');
// results:
[
    1 => 'name1',
    2 => 'name2',
];

  • 1 WHERE LIMIT
  • ryunosuke\dbml\Database::whereInto() WHERE IN 

$db->fetchTuple('SELECT id, name FROM tablename LIMIT 1');
// results:
[
    'id'   => 1,
    'name' => 'name1',
];

// results:
'name1';

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::select ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder 

// 
$qb = $db->select('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']);

// array/assoc 
$results = $db->selectArray('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchArray 
$results = $db->selectAssoc('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchAssoc 
$results = $db->selectLists('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchLists 
$results = $db->selectPairs('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchPairs 
$results = $db->selectTuple('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchTuple 
$results = $db->selectValue('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //  fetchValue

$tableDescriptor, $where

  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::column()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderBy()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::limit()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::groupBy()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchArray()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchAssoc()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchLists()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchPairs()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchTuple()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Database::fetchValue()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::entity ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder 

// 
$qb = $db->entity('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']);

// array/assoc 
$results = $db->entityArray('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); // 
$results = $db->entityAssoc('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); // 
$results = $db->entityTuple('tablename', ['create_date < ?' => '2000-12-23 12:34:56']); //

$tableDescriptor, $where

  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::cast()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::column()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::where()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::orderBy()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::limit()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::groupBy()
  • see ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::having()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::selectAggregate ($aggregation, $column, $where = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::selectCount() 

// SELECT COUNT(group_id) FROM t_table
$db->selectCount('t_table.group_id');

// SELECT MAX(id) FROM t_table WHERE delete_flg = 0 GROUP BY group_id
$db->selectMax('t_table.id', ['delete_flg' => 0], 'group_id');

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::selectExists ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $for_update = false) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

EXISTS 

// EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_table)
$db->selectExists('t_table');

// NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE delete_flg = 0)
$db->selectNotExists('t_table', ['delete_flg' => 0]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::selectNotExists ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $for_update = false) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

ryunosuke\dbml\Mixin\SelectAggregateTrait::selectExists() NOT

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::yield ($sql, $params = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Generator\Yielder

foreach PDO::fetch
ryunosuke\dbml\Generator\Yielder::setBufferMode(), ryunosuke\dbml\Generator\Yielder::setEmulationUnique() 

# 
foreach ($db->yieldArray('SELECT * FROM very_many_heavy_table') as $row) {
    // 
}

# 
foreach ($db->yieldArray($db->select('very_many_heavy_table')) as $row) {
    // 
}

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::export ($generator, $sql, $params = [], $config = [], $file = null) : int

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::yield()

exportXXX 

//  php 
$db->exportArray('SELECT * FROM tablename');

// /tmp/tablename.csv  CSV 
$db->exportCsv('SELECT * FROM tablename', [], [
    'bom'       => false,
    'encoding'  => 'SJIS_win',
], '/tmp/tablename.csv');

//  JSON 
$db->exportJson($db->select('t_parent/t_child'), [], [
    'assoc'  => false,
    'option' => JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE,
], null);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::exportArray ($config = [], $tableDescriptor = [], $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : void

php ryunosuke\dbml\Database::exportArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subselect ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder


2 1 + N tuple array/assoc
setLazyMode

WHERE ORDER LIMIT
N


{cond} 

# t_parent  t_child 
$row = $db->selectTuple([
    't_parent P' => [
        'parent_id',
        // 
        'childarray'            => $db->subselectArray('t_child'),
        // 
        'childassoc{cid: pid}'  => $db->subselectAssoc('t_child'),
    ],
]);

#  limit 
$rows = $db->selectArray([
    't_parent P' => [
        'parent_id',
        //  t_child 5
        'latestchildren' => $db->subselectArray('t_child', [], ['update_time' => 'DESC'], 5),
    ],
]);

# t_parent  t_child 
$row = $db->selectTuple([
    't_parent P' => [
        'parent_id',
        //  assoc 
        // 2
        'childassoc1'            => $db->subselectAssoc('t_child'),
        't_child AS childassoc2' => ['*'],
    ],
]);

# t_ancestor  t_parent  t_child 
$row = $db->selectTuple([
    't_ancestor AS A' => [
        't_parent AS P' => [
            't_child AS C' => ['*'],
        ],
    ],
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subselectArray ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

arrayryunosuke\dbml\Database::subselect()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subquery ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder


subexists subcount, submin 

// SELECT 
$db->select([
    't_article' => [
        //  t_article  t_comment  ID 
        'comment_ids' => $db->subquery('t_comment.GROUP_CONCAT(comment_id)'),
    ],
]);
// SELECT
//   (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(comment_id) FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS comment_ids
// FROM t_article

// WHERE 
$db->select('t_article', [
    // active  t_comment  t_article  EXISTS 
    'article_id' => $db->subquery('t_comment', ['status' => 'active']),
]);
// SELECT
//   t_article.*
// FROM t_article
// WHERE
//   article_id IN(
//     SELECT t_comment.article_id FROM t_comment WHERE
//       t_comment.status = 'active' AND
//       t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id
//   )

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subexists ($tableDescriptor = [], $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

EXISTS 

// SELECT 
$db->select([
    't_article' => [
        //  t_article  t_comment  true 
        'has_comment'     => $db->subexists('t_comment'),
        //  t_article  t_comment delete_flg = 0  true 
        'has_not_comment' => $db->notSubexists('t_comment', ['delete_flg' => 0]),
    ],
]);
// SELECT
//   EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS has_comment,
//   NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_comment WHERE (delete_flg = '0') AND (t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id)) AS has_not_comment
// FROM t_article

// WHERE 
$db->select('t_article', [
    //  WHERE EXISTS 
    $db->subexists('t_comment'),
]);
// SELECT
//   t_article.*
// FROM t_article
// WHERE (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id))

// JOIN t_article  t_comment 
$db->select('t_article, t_something', [
    // 
    't_article'          => $db->subexists('t_comment'),
    //  t_something  t_comment 
    't_something'        => $db->subexists('t_comment'),
    //  t_something :
    't_something:fkname' => $db->subexists('t_comment'),
]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::notSubexists ($tableDescriptor = [], $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

ryunosuke\dbml\Mixin\SubAggregateTrait::subexists()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate ($aggregate, $column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

aggaregate

subXXX 

# SELECT 
$db->select([
    't_article' => [
        // t_article  t_comment 
        'subcount' => $db->subcount('t_comment'),
        // t_article  t_comment.comment_id 
        'submin'   => $db->submin('t_comment.comment_id'),
        // t_article  t_comment.comment_id 
        'submax'   => $db->submax('t_comment.comment_id'),
        // t_article  t_comment.comment_id 
        'subsum'   => $db->subsum('t_comment.comment_id'),
        // t_article  t_comment.comment_id 
        'subavg'   => $db->subavg('t_comment.comment_id'),
    ],
]);
// SELECT
//   (SELECT COUNT(*) AS `*@count` FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS subcount,
//   (SELECT MIN(t_comment.comment_id) AS `t_comment.comment_id@min` FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS submin,
//   (SELECT MAX(t_comment.comment_id) AS `t_comment.comment_id@max` FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS submax,
//   (SELECT SUM(t_comment.comment_id) AS `t_comment.comment_id@sum` FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS subsum,
//   (SELECT AVG(t_comment.comment_id) AS `t_comment.comment_id@avg` FROM t_comment WHERE t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id) AS subavg
// FROM t_article

# WHERE 1
$db->select('t_article A', [
    // 3
    '3 < ?' => $db->subcount('t_comment'),
]);
// SELECT A.*
// FROM t_article A
// WHERE
//   3 < (
//     SELECT COUNT(*) AS `*@count`
//     FROM t_comment
//     WHERE t_comment.article_id = A.article_id
//   )

# WHERE 2
$db->select('t_article A+t_comment C', [
    // 1
    'C.comment_id' => $db->submax('t_comment.comment_id'),
]);
// SELECT A.*, C.*
// FROM t_article A
// INNER JOIN t_comment C ON C.article_id = A.article_id
// WHERE C.comment_id IN (
//   SELECT MAX(t_comment.comment_id) AS `t_comment.comment_id@max`
//   FROM t_comment
//   WHERE t_comment.article_id = A.article_id
// )

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subcount ($column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

COUNT ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::submin ($column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

MIN ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::submax ($column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

MAX ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subsum ($column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

SUM ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subavg ($column, $where = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

AVG ryunosuke\dbml\Database::subaggregate()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::aggregate ($aggregation, $column, $where = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : intarray

  • 0
    • 1value
    • 2tuple
  • 1
    • 1pairs
    • 2assoc
  • array 
// t_table.group_id  COUNT 
$db->aggregate('count', 't_table.group_id');

// t_table.group_id  AVG 
$db->aggregate('avg', 't_table.group_id', [], 't_table.group_id');

// t_table.group_id  MIN,MAX 
$db->aggregate(['min', 'max'], 't_table.group_id', [], 't_table.group_id');

SELECT
MIN, MAX 

// t_table 
$db->count('t_table');

// id 10  t_table.id 
$db->min('t_table.id', ['id < 10']);

// id 10  group_id  t_table.id  `[group_id => max]` 
$db->max('t_table.id', ['id < 10'], ['group_id']);

// id 10  group_id  t_table.score  5  `[group_id => [id@sum => id@sum, score@sum => score@sum]]` 
$db->sum('t_table.id,score', ['id < 10'], ['group_id'], ['score@sum >= 5']);

$aggregate 

# t_login  user_id 20162018
$db->aggregate([
    'year_2016' => 'SUM(YEAR(login_at) = "2016")',              // 
    'year_2017' => $db->raw('SUM(YEAR(login_at) = ?)', '2017'), //  raw  Expression 
    'year_2018' => ['SUM(YEAR(login_at) = ?)' => '2018'],       //  Expression 
], 't_login', ['login_at:[~)' => ['2016-01-01', '2019-01-01']], 'user_id');
// SELECT
//     user_id,
//     SUM(YEAR(login_at) = "2016") AS `year_2016`,
//     SUM(YEAR(login_at) = "2017") AS `year_2017`,
//     SUM(YEAR(login_at) = "2018") AS `year_2018`
// FROM
//     t_login
// WHERE
//     login_at >= "2016-01-01" AND login_at < "2019-01-01"
// GROUP BY
//     user_id

# 
$db->aggregate([
    'SUM(YEAR(login_at) = ?)' => ['2016', '2017', '2018'],
], 't_login', ['login_at:[~)' => ['2016-01-01', '2019-01-01']], 'user_id');
//  SQL

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::exists ($tableDescriptor, $where = [], $for_update = false) : bool 

#  t_article  bool 
$db->exists('t_article');
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_article)

#  t_article  bool 
$db->exists('t_article', ['delete_flg' => 0]);
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_article WHERE t_article.delete_flg = 0)

#  t_article  bool 
$db->exists('t_article', ['delete_flg' => 0], true);
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_article WHERE t_article.delete_flg = 0 FOR UPDATE)

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::union ($unions, $column = [], $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

UNION

FROM $unions $column $where 

$db->union(['SELECT "a"', 'SELECT "b"']);
//   `SELECT "a" UNION SELECT "b"` 

$db->union(['SELECT "a1" AS c1, "a2" AS c2', 'SELECT "b1" AS c1, "b2" AS c2'], ['c1']);
//  UNION  FROM  `SELECT c1 FROM (SELECT "a1" AS c1, "a2" AS c2 UNION SELECT "b1" AS c1, "b2" AS c2) AS T` 

$db->union(['SELECT "a1" AS c1, "a2" AS c2', 'SELECT "b1" AS c1, "b2" AS c2'], ['c1'], ['c2' => 'b1']);
//  UNION  FROM  `SELECT c1 FROM (SELECT "a1" AS c1, "a2" AS c2 UNION SELECT "b1" AS c1, "b2" AS c2) AS T WHERE c2 = "b1"` 

$db->unionAll([$db->select('t_article'), $db->select('t_article')]);
//

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::unionAll ($unions, $column = [], $where = [], $orderBy = [], $limit = [], $groupBy = [], $having = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

UNION ALL

ALL UNION ryunosuke\dbml\Database::union()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::neighbor ($tableDescriptor, $predicates, $limit = 1) : array

ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder::neighbor()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::gather ($tablename, $wheres = [], $other_wheres = [], $parentive = false) : array 


# t_article: 1 t_article -> t_comment -> t_comment_file 
$db->gather('t_article', ['article_id' => 1]);
// results:
[
    't_article' => [
        ['article_id' => 1],
    ],
    't_comment' => [
        ['comment_id' => 1, 'article_id' => 1],
        ['comment_id' => 2, 'article_id' => 1],
    ],
    't_comment_file' => [
        ['file_id' => 1, 'comment_id' => 1],
        ['file_id' => 2, 'comment_id' => 1],
        ['file_id' => 3, 'comment_id' => 2],
    ],
];

# $other_wheres 
$db->gather('t_article', ['article_id' => 1], [
    't_comment'      => ['comment_id' => 2],
    't_comment_file' => '0',
]);
// results:
[
    't_article' => [
        ['article_id' => 1],
    ],
    't_comment' => [
        ['comment_id' => 2, 'article_id' => 1],
    ],
];

# $parentive: true 
$db->gather('t_comment_file', ['file_id' => 1], [], true);
// results:
[
    't_comment_file' => [
        ['file_id' => 1, 'comment_id' => 1],
    ],
    't_comment' => [
        ['comment_id' => 1, 'article_id' => 1],
    ],
    't_article' => [
        ['article_id' => 1],
    ],
];

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare ($sql, $params = []) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

prepare 

# 
// UPDATE
// prepare  name 
$stmt = $db->prepare('UPDATE t_table SET name = ? WHERE id = :id', ['hoge']);
//  id 
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 1]); // UPDATE t_table SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = 1
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 2]); // UPDATE t_table SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = 2

// SELECT
//  Statement  fetchXXX 
$stmt = $db->prepare('SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id = :id');
$db->fetchTuple($stmt, ['id' => 1]); // SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id = 1
$db->fetchTuple($stmt, ['id' => 2]); // SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id = 2

#  DML ":id"  Statement 
// SELECT
$stmt = $db->prepareSelect('t_table', ':id');
$db->fetchTuple($stmt, ['id' => 1]); // SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id = 1
$db->fetchTuple($stmt, ['id' => 2]); // SELECT * FROM t_table WHERE id = 2
// INSERT
$stmt = $db->prepareInsert('t_table', [':id', ':name']);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 101, 'name' => 'hoge']);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 102, 'name' => 'fuga']);
// UPDATE
$stmt = $db->prepareUpdate('t_table', [':name'], [':id']);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 101, 'name' => 'HOGE']);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 102, 'name' => 'FUGA']);
// DELETE
$stmt = $db->prepareDelete('t_table', [':id']);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 101]);
$stmt->executeAffect(['id' => 102]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareSelect (...$args) : ryunosuke\dbml\Query\QueryBuilder

SELECT ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::select()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareInsert (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

INSERT ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareUpdate (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

UPDATE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::update()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareDelete (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

DELETE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::delete()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareModify (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

MODEFIY ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::modify()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepareReplace (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

REPLACE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::prepare(), ryunosuke\dbml\Database::replace()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::executeSelect ($query, $params = []) : Doctrine\DBAL\Result

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::executeAffect ($query, $params = []) : intstring

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::dryrun () : ryunosuke\dbml\Database

dryrun


insertArray/updateArray

setOption ryunosuke\dbml\Database::context()

  • setOption('dryrun', true);
  • context(['dryrun' => true]);

=
ryunosuke\dbml\Database::context() 

$db->dryrun()->update('t_table', $data, $where);
//  dryrun 

$db->dryrun();
$db->update('t_table', $data, $where);
// dryrun 

$db->dryrun()->t_table->update($data, $where);
// Gateway  dryrun  `->t_table`  GC  `->update` 

$db->t_table->dryrun()->update($data, $where);
// Gateway  Gateway  dryrun

null
$default

$tablename 

# 
$array = $db->getEmptyRecord('t_article');

# 
$entity = $db->getEmptyRecord('Article');

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::migrate ($tableName, $dml, $recordsOrFilename, $opt = []) : arrayint

SQL

SQL
csv,json,php sql

dryrun: true false affected rows
change delete

$dml

  • select:
    • dryrun WHERE SQL
    • dryrun
  • insert:
    • dryrun INSERT SQL
    • dryrun INSERT
  • update:
    • dryrun UPDATE SQL
    • dryrun UPDATE
  • delete:
    • dryrun DELETE SQL
    • dryrun DELETE
  • modify:
    • dryrun UPSERT(MODIFY) SQL
    • dryrun MODIFY
  • change:
    • dryrun INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE SQL
    • dryrun
  • save:
    • dryrun INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE SQL
    • dryrun

null

$opt chunk ignore
chunk/bulk SQL

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::import ($datatree) : int

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::changeArray() 

# t_ancestor  t_parent  t_child 
$db->import([
    't_ancestor' => [
        [
            'ancestor_name' => '',
            't_parent' => [
                [
                    'parent_name' => '',
                    't_child' => [
                        [
                            'child_name' => '1',
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ],
]);
// INSERT INTO t_ancestor (ancestor_id, ancestor_name) VALUES (1, "") ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ancestor_id = VALUES(ancestor_id), ancestor_name = VALUES(ancestor_name)
// INSERT INTO t_parent (parent_id, parent_name, ancestor_id) VALUES (1, "", 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE parent_id = VALUES(parent_id), parent_name = VALUES(parent_name), ancestor_id = VALUES(ancestor_id)
// INSERT INTO t_child (child_id, child_name, parent_id) VALUES (1, "1", 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE child_id = VALUES(child_id), child_name = VALUES(child_name), parent_id = VALUES(parent_id)
//  DELETE

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::loadCsv ($tableName, $filename, $options = []) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

CSV

CSV
mysql native:true LOAD DATA INFILE
RDBMS

$options

namedefault
nativefalseRDBMS mysql
encodingmb_internal_encoding
skip01
delimiter','fgetcsv 2
enclosure'"'fgetcsv 3
escape'\'fgetcsv 4
eol"\n"native:true
chunknullnative:false
var_prefix''mysql native:true

native
native INSERT

$table 1
CSV 

#  t_hoge {id: int, name: string, data: blob, flg: tinyint} 

# CSV: "1,hoge,data,0"  CSV 
$db->loadCsv('t_hoge', $csvfile);
// results: ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge', 'data' => 'data', 'flg' => 0];

# CSV: "hoge,0" CSV 
$db->loadCsv([
    //  [ => ] 
    't_hoge' => [
        //  CSV 
        'name', // CSV 1
        'flg',  // CSV 2
        // CSV 
        'id'   => 1,
        'data' => null,
    ],
], $csvfile);
// results: ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge', 'data' => null, 'flg' => 0];

# CSV: "1,hoge,dummy,0" CSV 
$db->loadCsv([
    't_hoge' => [
        'id',   // CSV 1
        'name', // CSV 2
        null,   // CSV 3 null 
        'flg',  // CSV 4
    ],
], $csvfile);
// results: ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge', 'data' => null, 'flg' => 0];

# CSV: "1,hoge"  HOGE SQL 
$db->loadCsv([
    't_hoge' => [
        'id',
        //  ? 
        'name' => new Expression('UPPER(?)'),
        // php CSV 
        'name' => function ($v) { return strtoupper($v); },
    ],
], $csvfile);
// results: ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'HOGE', 'data' => null];

mysql native null eol
PDO PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_LOCAL_INFILE: true

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertSelect ($tableName, $sql, $columns = [], $params = []) : intstringryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

INSERT INTO SELECT 

#  INSERT INTO SELECT
$db->insertSelect('t_destination', 'SELECT * FROM t_source');
// INSERT INTO t_destination SELECT * FROM t_source

# $columns  INSERT 
$db->insertSelect('t_destination', 'SELECT * FROM t_source', ['id', 'name', 'content']);
// INSERT INTO t_destination (id, name, content) SELECT * FROM t_source

# 
$db->insertSelect('t_destination', $db->select('t_source'));
// INSERT INTO t_destination SELECT * FROM t_source

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertSelectIgnore (...$args) : intstringryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertSelect()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertArray ($tableName, $data, $chunk = 0) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

BULK INSERT

BULK INSERT 

$db->insertArray('t_table', [
    [
        'colA' => '1',                       // [ => ] 
        'colB' => $db->raw('UPEER(?)', 'b'), // [ => Expression] 
    ],
    [
        'colA' => '2',
        'colB' => $db->raw('UPEER(?)', 'b'),
    ],
]);
// INSERT INTO t_table (colA, colB) VALUES ('1', UPPER('b')), ('2', UPPER('b'))

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertArrayIgnore (...$args) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::updateArray ($tableName, $data, $identifier = [], $chunk = 0) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

BULK UPDATE


$data 

# (id = 1,2,3)  UPDATE 
$db->updateArray('tablename', [
    ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge'],
    ['id' => 2, 'data' => 'FUGA'],
    ['id' => 3, 'name' => 'piyo', 'data' => 'PIYO'],
], ['status_cd' => 50]);
// UPDATE tablename SET
//   name = CASE id WHEN '1' THEN 'hoge' WHEN '3' THEN 'piyo' ELSE name END,
//   data = CASE id WHEN '2' THEN 'FUGA' WHEN '3' THEN 'PIYO' ELSE data END
// WHERE (status_cd = '50') AND (id IN ('1','2','3'))

UPDATE

$data WHERE
$identifier status_cd = 50

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::updateArrayIgnore (...$args) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::updateArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::modifyArray ($tableName, $insertData, $updateData = [], $chunk = 0) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

BULK UPSERT

$insertData modify

$updateData
$updateData [key => value] 

#  (name = XXX)  (name = hoge,fuga,piyo) 
$db->modifyArray('tablename', [
    ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge'],
    ['id' => 2, 'name' => 'fuga'],
    ['id' => 3, 'name' => 'piyo'],
], ['name' => 'XXX']);
// INSERT INTO tablename (id, name) VALUES
//   ('1', 'hoge'),
//   ('2', 'fuga'),
//   ('3', 'piyo')
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   name = 'XXX'

# $updateData  VALUES(col) 
$db->modifyArray('tablename', [
    ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge'],
    ['id' => 2, 'name' => 'fuga'],
    ['id' => 3, 'name' => 'piyo'],
]);
// INSERT INTO tablename (id, name) VALUES
//   ('1', 'hoge'),
//   ('2', 'fuga'),
//   ('3', 'piyo')
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   id = VALUES(id),
//   name = VALUES(name)

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::modifyArrayIgnore (...$args) : intstringstring[]ryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::modifyArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::changeArray ($tableName, $dataarray, $identifier) : array

INSERT+UPDATE+DELETE

prepare

  • BULK MERGE modifyArray() + delete
  • BULK MERGE modifyArray() + delete
  • merge prepareModify() + delete
  • merge prepareModify() + delete
  • merge modify + delete
  • merge select + insert/update + delete

[primaryKeys]

dryrun [[primaryKeys], [ SQL]] 2

primaryKeys dryrun key sql 

# `['category' => 'misc']` 33id  1,2,3 
$db->changeArray('table_name', [
    ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge'],
    ['id' => 2, 'name' => 'fuga'],
    ['id' => 3, 'name' => 'piyo'],
], ['category' => 'misc']);
// BULK MERGE 
// INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES
//   ('1', 'hoge'),
//   ('2', 'fuga'),
//   ('3', 'piyo')
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   id = VALUES(id),
//   name = VALUES(name)
// DELETE FROM table_name WHERE (category = 'misc') AND (NOT (id IN ('1', '2', '3')))
//
// merge merge 
// [prepare] INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES (?, ?) ON UPDATE id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name)
// [execute] INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES (1, 'hoge') ON UPDATE id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name)
// [execute] INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES (2, 'fuga') ON UPDATE id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name)
// [execute] INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES (3, 'piyo') ON UPDATE id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name)
// DELETE FROM table_name WHERE (category = 'misc') AND (NOT (id IN ('1', '2', '3')))
//
// merge  select  insert,  update 
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE id = '1')
// UPDATE table_name SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = '1'
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE id = '2')
// UPDATE table_name SET name = 'fuga' WHERE id = '2'
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE id = '3')
// INSERT INTO table_name (id, name) VALUES ('3', 'piyo')
// DELETE FROM table_name WHERE (category = 'misc') AND (NOT (id IN ('1', '2', '3')))

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::changeArrayIgnore (...$args) : array

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::changeArray()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::save ($tableName, $data) : arraystring[]

modify + changeArray

ORM save
update/ insert changeArray
changeArray 

#  ->  -> 
$db->save('t_parent', [
    'parent_name' => 'parent1',
    't_child'     => [
        [
            'child_name' => 'child11',
            't_grand'    => [
                [
                    'grand_name' => 'grand111',
                ],
                [
                    'grand_name' => 'grand112',
                ],
            ],
        ],
        [
            'child_name' => 'child12',
            't_grand'    => [
                [
                    'grand_name' => 'grand121',
                ],
                [
                    'grand_name' => 'grand122',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ],
]);

#  modify 
// INSERT INTO
//   t_parent(parent_id, parent_name)
// VALUES
//   (1, 'parent1')
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   parent_id = VALUES(parent_id),
//   parent_name = VALUES(parent_name)

#  changeArray 
// INSERT INTO
//   t_child(child_id, child_name, parent_id)
// VALUES
//   (1, 'child11', 60),
//   (2, 'child12', 60)
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   child_id = VALUES(child_id),
//   child_name = VALUES(child_name),
//   parent_id = VALUES(parent_id)
// changeArray 
// DELETE FROM t_child WHERE (t_child.parent_id IN(1)) AND (NOT(t_child.child_id IN(1, 2)))

#  changeArray 
// INSERT INTO
//   t_grand(grand_id, grand_name, child_id)
// VALUES
//   (1, 'grand111', 1),
//   (2, 'grand112', 1),
//   (3, 'grand121', 2),
//   (4, 'grand122', 2)
// ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
//   grand_id = VALUES(grand_id),
//   grand_name = VALUES(grand_name),
//   child_id = VALUES(child_id)
// changeArray 
// DELETE FROM t_grand WHERE (t_grand.child_id IN(1, 2)) AND (NOT(t_grand.grand_id IN(1, 2, 3, 4)))

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::saveIgnore (...$args) : arraystring[]

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::save()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::create ($tableName, $data) : stringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

insertOrThrow

updateOrThrow deleteOrThrow insertOrThrow
insert OrThrow

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert ($tableName, $data) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

INSERT 

# 1 INSERT
$db->insert('tablename', [
    'id'   => 1,
    'name' => 'hoge',
]);
// INSERT INTO tablename (id, name) VALUES ('1', 'hoge')

# 
$db->insert('tablename.name', 'hoge');
// INSERT INTO tablename (name) VALUES ('hoge')
$db->insert('tablename.id, name', ['1', 'hoge']);
// INSERT INTO tablename (id, name) VALUES ('1', 'hoge')

# TableDescriptor  QueryBuilder  INSERT 
//  INSERT
$db->insert('t_article + t_article_misc', [
    'title'     => 'article_title', // t_article 
    'misc_data' => 'misc_data',     // t_article_misc 
]);
// INSERT INTO t_article (title) VALUES ('article_title')
// INSERT INTO t_article_misc (id, misc_data) VALUES ('1', 'misc_data')

#  INSERT 
$db->insert([
    't_article' => [
        'title' => 'article_title',
    ],
    '+t_article_misc' => [
        'misc_data' => 'misc_data',
    ],
], []);
// INSERT INTO t_article (title) VALUES ('article_title')
// INSERT INTO t_article_misc (id, misc_data) VALUES ('1', 'misc_data')

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertOrThrow (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

0 ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertIgnore (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

IGNORE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insertConditionally (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

ryunosuke\dbml\Database::insert()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::update ($tableName, $data, $identifier = []) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

UPDATE 

# 1 UPDATE
$db->update('tablename', [
    'name' => 'hoge',
], ['id' => 1]);
// UPDATE tablename SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = '1'

# 
$db->update('tablename.name', 'hoge', ['id' => 1]);
// UPDATE tablename SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = '1'

# TableDescriptor  QueryBuilder  UPDATE JOIN  mysql 
$db->update('t_article + t_comment', [
    'title'   => 'hoge',
    'comment' => 'fuga',
]);
// UPDATE t_article INNER JOIN t_comment ON t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id SET title = "hoge", comment = "fuga"

# UPDATE JOIN  mysql 
$db->update([
    't_article' => [
        'title' => 'hoge',
    ],
    '+t_comment' => [
        'comment' => 'fuga',
    ],
], []);
// UPDATE t_article A INNER JOIN t_comment C ON C.article_id = A.article_id SET A.title = 'hoge', C.comment = 'fuga'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::updateOrThrow (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

0 ryunosuke\dbml\Database::update()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::updateIgnore (...$args) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::delete ($tableName, $identifier = []) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

DELETE 

# 1 DELETE
$db->delete('tablename', ['id' => 1]);
// DELETE FROM tablename WHERE id = '1'

# TableDescriptor  QueryBuilder  DELETE JOIN  mysql 
$db->delete('t_article + t_comment', [
    't_article.article_id' => 1,
]);
// DELETE t_article FROM t_article INNER JOIN t_comment ON t_comment.article_id = t_article.article_id WHERE t_article.article_id = 1

CASCADE/SET NULL /NULL
DELETE 

# childtable -> parenttable  RESTRICT 
$db->remove('parenttable', ['id' => 1]);
// DELETE FROM parenttable WHERE id = '1' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM childtable WHERE parenttable.id = childtable.parent_id))

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::destroy ($tableName, $identifier = []) : intstring[]

DELETE RESTRICT/NO ACTION

RESTRICT/NO ACTION
DELETE

RESTRICT/NO ACTION CASCADE
RESTRICT/NO ACTION

RESTRICT/NO ACTION

IN SQLServer mysql 5.6 

# childtable -> parenttable  RESTRICT 
$db->destroy('parenttable', ['status' => 'deleted']);
// DELETE FROM childtable WHERE (cid) IN (parenttable id FROM parenttable WHERE status = 'deleted')
// DELETE FROM parenttable WHERE status = 'deleted'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::reduce ($tableName, $limit = null, $orderBy = [], $groupBy = [], $identifier = []) : intstring

DELETE

$orderBy $limit DELETE
$groupBy $limit

$orderBy
"+column" + "-column" -
['column' => true] orderBy

IN SQLServer mysql 5.6 

# logs  log_time  10 
$db->reduce('logs', 10, '-log_time');

# logs  log_time  10 
$db->reduce('logs', 10, '-log_time', ['category']);

# logs  log_time  10 11
$db->reduce('logs', 10, '-log_time', ['category'], ['log_time < ?' => date('Y-m-d', strtotime('now -1 month'))]);

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::reduceOrThrow (...$args) : intstring

0 ryunosuke\dbml\Database::reduce()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsert ($tableName, $insertData, $updateData = []) : intstringarray

INSERT UPDATE

SELECT EXISTS INSERT UPDATE
RDBMS mysql deadlock

OrThrow

  • insert ( lastInsertId )
  • update ( )
  • ( )

# id  AUTOINCREMENT  INSERT 
$db->upsert('tablename', ['name' => 'hoge']);
// INSERT INTO tablename (name) VALUES ('piyo') --  AUTOINCREMENT

# id  AUTOINCREMENT  SELECT EXISTS 
$db->upsert('tablename', ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'hoge']);
// SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tablename WHERE id = '1')
//   : INSERT INTO tablename (id, name) VALUES ('1', 'hoge')
//   :   UPDATE tablename SET name = 'hoge' WHERE id = '1'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsertOrThrow (...$args) : intstringarray

0 ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsert()

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsertConditionally (...$args) : intstringarray

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::modify ($tableName, $insertData, $updateData = []) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

MERGE

RDBMS

  • sqlite INSERT ON CONFLICT(...) DO UPDATE
  • mysql INSERT ON DUPLICATE KEY
  • postgresql INSERT ON CONFLICT(...) DO UPDATE
  • sqlserver MERGE ryunosuke\dbml\Database::upsert() 
#  INSERT  ON DUPLICATE KEY
$db->modify('tablename', [
    'id'   => 1,
    'name' => 'hoge',
]);
// INSERT INTO tablename SET id = '1', name = 'hoge' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name)

# $updateData 
$db->modify('tablename', [
    'id'   => 1,
    'name' => 'hoge',
], ['name' => 'fuga']);
// INSERT INTO tablename SET id = '1', name = 'hoge' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'fuga'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::replace ($tableName, $data) : intstringarrayryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement

REPLACE

REPLACE
REPLACE DELETE -> INSERT CASCADE DELETE 

#  REPLACE
$db->replace('tablename', [
    'id'   => 1,
    'name' => 'hoge',
]);
// REPLACE INTO tablename (id, name, othercolumn) SELECT '1', 'hoge', othercolumn FROM (SELECT NULL) __T LEFT JOIN tablename ON id = '1'

method ryunosuke\dbml\Database::duplicate ($targetTable, $overrideData = [], $where = [], $sourceTable = null) : intstringryunosuke\dbml\Query\Statement 

#  tablename 2 AUTOINCREMENT 
$db->duplicate('tablename');
// INSERT INTO tablename (name, other_columns) SELECT name AS name, other_columns AS other_columns FROM tablename

# 
$db->duplicate('tablename', [
    'name' => 'copied',
], ['id' => 1]);
// INSERT INTO tablename (name, other_columns) SELECT 'copied' AS name, other_columns AS other_columns FROM tablename WHERE id = '1'
